text: Nocardioides deserti is a Gram-positive and aerobic bacterium from the genus Nocardioides which has been isolated from rhizosphere soil from the plant Alhagi sparsifolia in the Taklimakan desert in Xinjiang in China. == References == ==External links== *Type strain of Nocardioides deserti at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase deserti Category:Bacteria described in 2015
title: Nocardioides deserti
